articles.description: Some users on Twitter blasted Apple for launching these new emojis. One of them asked if Apple is "fat shaming".
articles.content:
Apple first launched the new emojis in January.
In yet another woke move, Apple has made available the 'pregnant man', 'pregnant person' and other gender-neutral emojis to all the iPhone users. The … [+2035 chars]
